component.title: REST
component.description: The Core Camel Java DSL based router
component.label: core,http,rest

consumes.description: Media type such as: 'text/xml' or 'application/json' this REST service accepts. By default we accept all kinds of types.

produces.description: Media type such as: 'text/xml' or 'application/json' this REST service returns.

componentName.description: The Camel Rest component to use for the REST transport such as restlet spark-rest. If no component has been explicit configured then Camel will lookup if there is a Camel component that integrates with the Rest DSL or if a org.apache.camel.spi.RestConsumerFactory is registered in the registry. If either one is found then that is being used.

inType.description: To declare the incoming POJO binding type as a FQN class name

outType.description: To declare the outgoing POJO binding type as a FQN class name

routeId.description: Name of the route this REST services creates

description.description: Human description to document this REST service

exchangePattern.description: Sets the default exchange pattern when creating an exchange.

synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
